fields.description: When did this transaction take place? The date should be written as YYYY-MM-DD, or in full date-time format.
fields.name: transactionDate
fields.title: Transaction date

fields.description: The currency used in amounts. The currency used in amounts. Use the three-letter currency code from [ISO 4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) eg: GBP
fields.name: currency
fields.title: Currency

fields.description: The total value of this transaction.
fields.name: value
fields.title: Value

fields.description: The date that this value was set (to allow historical currency conversion). The date should be written as YYYY-MM-DD, or in full date-time format.
fields.name: valueDate
fields.title: Value date

fields.description: The organisation identifier of the provider of transaction funds.
fields.name: provider
fields.title: Provider

fields.description: The organisation identifier of the recipient of transaction funds.
fields.name: recipient
fields.title: Recipient

fields.description: When was information about this transaction last updated? A full date-time should be given. Usually this can be generated automatically by the software managing or exporting this data.
fields.name: dateModified
fields.title: Last modified
